name: Camping Mama: Outdoor Adventures
description:
Play as Mama’s son or daughter as you set up camp, interact with wildlife, endure forces of nature, and even hunt for treasure!

Features

• Explore 38 adventurous levels with Mama, Papa, and family.
• Master 100 different games! Climb, swim, coof, raft, and so much more!
• Craft homemade items like fishing poles and nets to survive in the wild.
• Collect insects, fish, treasure, and more to add to your scrap book.
